title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet column. It does not have the same width as the property sheet column.
EB: I would have expected the behavior where the combo box is always the width of the property sheet column. Note that it should work the same as DialogCellEditor (Button always visible). I will need to investigate to determine if this issue is caused by us or SWT.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Locate the column with the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the combo box does not have the same width as the property sheet column.
